name: A Bonnie Day
description:
In this adorable isometric game, you take control of a Scottish lighthouse keeper’s beloved canine, Bonnie. Help guide the hound as she takes care of the daily chores of the lighthouse for her sick human, travelling from the bottom floor all the way to the lantern control room to cross things off the to-do list. From doing the dishes, to scaring off those pesky seagulls, there’s a lot that needs doing! And don’t forget to make the keeper eat his soup!

This game was created by Team Coll, a postgraduate student team at Abertay University, with a development cycle of 12 weeks. A Bonnie Day is the team's love letter to Scotland, shared with you!
